lead_paragraph: But its earnings exceed expectations after the private equity firm sold positions in many of its public holdings.

headline.main: Tax Hit in France and Hedge Funds Weigh on Carlyle

snippet: But its earnings exceed expectations after the private equity firm sold positions in many of its public holdings.
abstract: DealBook online; Carlyle Group reports weaker first-quarter net income, down 15 percent to $273 million, compared with $322 million in year-ago period.
